story_teamaquamagma_02_07000/2401_1101_0:
Meanwhile, when Brendan and friends were
fighting Kyogre...
story_teamaquamagma_02_07000/2401_1001_0: Yo, yo! Hand over your Pokémon!
Hey, you too! Come on, give us your Pokémon!

Ahahaha! No one’s here to stop us! We can be as
bad as we like!

Yeah! And it’s all thanks to Team Magma and
Team Aqua!
